paragraphs: Tendremos muchos platillos y opciones para que todos puedan disfrutar la cena.
Queremos que te sientas comodo y bien atendido durante toda la celebracion.

noticeSection.title: Avisanos tus requerimientos
noticeSection.description: Por favor dinos si tienes alguna necesidad alimentaria para poder cuidarte.

en.title: Diets and allergies
en.note: We will share more information soon.

paragraphs: We will have many dishes and options so everyone can enjoy dinner.
We want you to feel comfortable and well taken care of throughout the celebration.

noticeSection.title: Let us know your dietary requirements
noticeSection.description: Please tell us if you have any dietary needs so we can take care of you.
